parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> RTD

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma 3

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value>1.34

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add virtual custom weight to a helicopter's center of gravity. This can be used to simulate added internal payload for specific scenarios, and affects the flight model.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>afm</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> helicopterRTD '''setCustomWeightRTD''' weight

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> helicopterRTD : [[ObjectRTD]] - helicopter
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> weight: [[Number]] - weight (kilograms)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myHelicopterRTD [[setCustomWeightRTD]] 120;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[weightRTD]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 4, 2014 - 06:41 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Benargee|Benargee]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Value can be negative. Do not set negative value lower than helicopter's total weight.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
